Plot: Elliot is going to the island of Eden to live out his submissive fantasies, but inadvertently photographs diamond smugglers at work. Smugglers, and detectives, follow him to the island, ...
Title: Exit to Eden
Writer: Anne Rice (novel), Deborah Amelon (screenplay), Bob Brunner (screenplay)
Actors: Dana Delany, Paul Mercurio, Rosie O'Donnell, Dan Aykroyd
